description: When shopping for lunch, Kyousuke meets Manami and invites her to cook for him when his parents are away. Kirino doesn`t like it and makes the event a living hell for both. Some time later, Kyousuke gets an invitation from Saori to a special event; arriving there he`s welcomed by his "personal harem", consisting of Saori, Kuroneko, and Kirino... in maid costumes.

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas être une servante
Ore no Imouto ga Konna ni Maid na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way My Little Sister Can Be a Maid
俺の妹がこんなにメイドなわけがない
